00048 {
00049     namespace os
00050     {
00056         class RTT_API ThreadInterface
00057         {
00058         public:
00059             ThreadInterface();
00060             virtual ~ThreadInterface();
00061 
00070             virtual bool start() = 0;
00071 
00080             virtual bool stop() = 0;
00081 
00085             virtual Seconds getPeriod() const = 0;
00086 
00092             virtual bool setPeriod(Seconds new_period) = 0;
00093 
00097             virtual nsecs getPeriodNS() const = 0;
00098 
00108             virtual bool isRunning() const = 0;
00109 
00115             virtual bool isActive() const = 0;
00116 
00120             virtual const char* getName() const = 0;
00121 
00128             virtual RTOS_TASK * getTask() = 0;
00129 
00133             virtual const RTOS_TASK * getTask() const = 0;
00134 
00153             virtual bool setScheduler(int sched_type) = 0;
00154 
00162             virtual int getScheduler() const = 0;
00163 
00170             virtual bool setPriority(int priority) = 0;
00171 
00179             virtual int getPriority() const = 0;
00180 
00181             virtual void setMaxOverrun(int m) = 0;
00182 
00183             virtual int getMaxOverrun() const = 0;
00184 
00189             virtual void setWaitPeriodPolicy(int p) = 0;
00190 
00194             virtual void yield() = 0;
00195 
00199             unsigned int threadNumber() const
00200             {
00201                 return threadnb;
00202             }
00203 
00204             bool isSelf() const;
00205         protected:

00212         };
